title: Malzahar Passive Covers Skin Colors
body:
{{champion:90}} 
Malzahar's purple passive (spell shield) visually covers up the colors of the skin you've selected.
I purchased 'Shadow Prince Malzahar' for its yellow theme but was disappointed to see that the passive spell shield essentially turns him pink for half the game. This also applies to all other Malzahar skins as well (with the exception of 'Snow Day Malzahar')

I petition to have Malzahar's passive spell shield as more transparent to show off the colors of the skin that you've selected.

To show you visually...
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=jYy4oC5hSRU&t=169s
As you can see, the purple shield completely overpowers the work the graphics team put into the Malzahar skins.
Particularly at 1:30, you can see the shadow prince malzahar skin's stark color difference when the passive is up.

replies.body:
You could also say "Malzahar's rework was a failure regarding the whole champion".

Lol at 1:30 it even looks like he's not purple due to Passive shield covering him but that he literally has texture changed to purple tone.
Exactly! He looks purple when he should be yellow!

Hey folks! 

Sorry to necro this thread, but I wanted to pop in and let you know that we're going to be removing the purple overlay for the skins, so you'll actually be able to see the skin underneath! The purple (base) shield will still remain across all skins. We're hoping to have this in for 7.15!
